statements.statement: SELECT bookid as id, number, name, stories, catid as category, ( select c.name from categories c where b.catid = c.catid ) as categoryname, added, image FROM books b ORDER BY b.number asc
insert into books ( number, name, stories, catid, added ) values ( {number}, {name}, {stories}, {category}, NOW() )
update books set number = {number}, name = {name}, stories = {stories}, catid = {category} where bookid = {id}
delete from books where bookid = {id}
select catid as id, name from categories
select catid as id, name from categories where catid = {id}
delete from categories where id = {id}
select t.tagid as id, t.name, count(t2b.tagid) as ref from tags t left outer join tag2book t2b on t2b.tagid = t.tagid group by t.tagid
select t.tagid as id, t.name, count(t2b.tagid) as ref from tags t left outer join tag2book t2b on t2b.tagid = t.tagid where t.tagid = {id} group by t.tagid
select t.tagid as id, t.name, count(t2b.tagid) as ref from tags t left outer join tag2book t2b on t2b.tagid = t.tagid where t.name = {name} group by t.tagid

select t.tagid as id, t.name, count(tt.tagid) as ref from tags t left outer join tag2book t2b on t2b.tagid = t.tagid left outer join books b on b.bookid = t2b.bookid inner join tag2book tt on tt.tagid = t.tagid where b.bookid = {id} group by t.tagid
delete from tags where tagid = {id}
select tag2book as id, tagid, bookid from tag2book where tag2book = {id}
insert into tag2book ( tagid, bookid ) values ( {tagid}, {bookid} )
SELECT bookid as id, number, name, stories, catid as category, ( select c.name from categories c where b.catid = c.catid ) as categoryname, added, image FROM books b where bookid = {id}

select b.bookid as id, b.number, b.name, b.stories, b.catid as category, ( select c.name from categories c where b.catid = c.catid ) as categoryname, b.added, b.image from books b left outer join tag2book t2b on b.bookid = t2b.bookid left outer join tags t on t.tagid = t2b.tagid where t.tagid = {id} ORDER BY b.number asc

select b.bookid as id, b.number, b.name, b.stories, b.catid as category, ( select c.name from categories c where b.catid = c.catid ) as categoryname, b.added, b.image from books b where b.catid = {id} ORDER BY b.number asc

SELECT distinct b.bookid as id, b.number, b.name, b.stories, b.catid as category, ( select c.name from categories c where c.catid = b.catid ) as categoryname, b.added, b.image FROM books b WHERE b.name LIKE {term} or b.number LIKE {term} or b.stories LIKE {term} ORDER BY b.number ASC
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM books WHERE name LIKE {term} ORDER BY name
select last_insert_id()
